Property.name: Show Debug Info
Property.HelpText: Enables debug info and control of properties using the d-pad.

Property.name: PhysicsType
Property.HelpText: Rotation bases the physics on the player's rotation. Velocity bases the physics on the players vertical speed.

Property.name: Increase Speed Cap
Property.HelpText: Increases the maximum speed that all characters can reach and also increases acceleration in the slower characters.

Property.name: SA2JumpDash
Property.HelpText: If true, uses the SA2 Jump-Dash, which is longer and slightly less "thok"-y.

Property.name: JumpHeavyness
Property.HelpText: Controls how floaty/weighty the mid-air controls feel. Increasing this will increase gravity, but will also increase jump force to compensate.

Property.name: AirDeceleration
Property.HelpText: Controls how quickly you slow down in mid-air when not pressing anything.

Property.name: AirControl
Property.HelpText: Controls how quickly you slow down in mid-air when inputting the opposite direction.

Property.name: DeleteLoops
Property.HelpText: No splines will remove all automation, while boost-less splines will make the loop still control your direction, but won't give you any speed.

Property.name: DeleteDashPanels
Property.HelpText: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED WHEN "LOOP AUTOMATION TYPE" IS NOT "VANILLA". If true, removes dash panels from most levels.

Property.name: TweakCameras
Property.HelpText: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED WHEN "REMOVE LOOP AUTOMATION" IS TRUE. Enabling this will cause levels to use tweaked cameras that lessen disorientation when running through loops.

Property.name: MechanicsTweaks
Property.HelpText: Enables SonicFreak94's Mechanics Tweaks mod changes, which changes how things like enemy bouncing, jumping, springs, and spindashing work.

Property.name: Emerald Coast
Property.HelpText: Enables tweaks to the level, such as deleting splines or tweaking cameras.

Property.name: Sonic Rolling Deceleration
Property.HelpText: The amount of deceleration when rolling on flat ground.

Property.name: Sonic Max Roll Slope Influence
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based) Maximum slope influence while rolling.

Property.name: Sonic Min Roll Slope Influence
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based)Minimum slope influence while rolling.

Property.name: Sonic Roll Slope Influence Offset
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based)Median slope influence while rolling.

Property.name: Sonic Max Run Slope Influence
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based)Maximum slope influence while running.

Property.name: Sonic Min Run Slope Influence
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based)Minimum slope influence while running.

Property.name: Sonic Run Slope Influence Offset
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based)Median slope influence while running.

Property.name: Sonic Slope Influence Offset Divisor
Property.HelpText: (Velocity-based)Decides how slowly the slope influence goes from the median to the max or min. Higher values are slower.

Property.name: SonicSF
Property.HelpText: (Rotation-based)The amount of slope influence while standing.

Property.name: SonicSRU
Property.HelpText: (Rotation-based)The amount of slope influence while rolling upwards.

Property.name: SonicSRD
Property.HelpText: (Rotation-based)The amount of slope influence while rolling downwards.

Property.name: SonicJC
Property.HelpText: Per-player based jump-height multiplier. Don't mess with this too much.
